title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 303.0 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 303.0 - Purpose

State Regulations

The regulations contained in this Part have been
promulgated by the Office of General Services (OGS) pursuant to section
140
of the

Public Buildings Law, which requires that each public building be equipped with
on-site cardiac automated external defibrillators. The purpose of this
regulation is to provide for the installation and safe operation of a
sufficient number of cardiac automated external defibrillators in each public
building and to enable prompt response to human cardiac events that may occur
in such public buildings. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
303.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
